front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Three-Dimensional (3D) Medical Modelling

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard describes the generation and practical use of medical three-dimensional (3D) modeling for diagnostics and therapeutic applications. It includes volume rendering and surface rendering techniques for 3D reconstruction from two-dimensional (2D) medical images and a texturing method of 3D medical data for realistic visualization.
